parameter.label: Bridge ID
parameter.description: Sicuramente non servir√† - The mac address in upper case letters without delimiter for Version 3+ bridges. Leave empty for Version 1/2 devices. This is used to check if the given IP corresponds to the right device. The bridge is set offline if the device does not respond with the correct Bride ID and a re-detection is started. Useful for DHCP environments where IPs may change over time, after power outage etc.
